faq.desc: Are you having difficulty using our products and services?

arStorage.title: AR Storage Capacity
arStorage.desc: It may differ from the actual remaining storage so please use it as a reference.

arContent.title: Online AR Views
arContent.desc: It may differ from the actual view counts so please use it as a reference.

call.title: Talk minutes
call.desc: It may differ from the actual remaining Talk minutes so please use it as a reference.

storageOverflow.title: AR storage needs to be managed in the Workspace. Please delete some of your content according to purchased storage.
storageOverflow.desc: The content is saved for 14 days from the date of purchase and it will be deleted in the order of oldest to newest.

licenseOverflow.title: The service is limited due to the exceeding number of plans allotted to users compared with the plans you have. Inquire your Master admin for the plan management.
licenseOverflow.desc: If you are the Master admin please go to member settings and check plan allotment state.
